data.Area: Several undead creatures within a 50-ft. radius burst
data.DescriptionHtml:
As circle of death, except that this spell destroys undead creatures as noted above, and undead above 9 HD can be affected.
Material Component: The powder of a crushed diamond worth at least 500 gp.
data.Name: Undeath to Death
data.Rulebook: Tome and Blood: A Guidebook to Wizards and Sorcerers
